name: Sterling Labs, Inc
long_description:
currently in stealth

Reach out to us at founders@focusbuddy.ai

Our previous product - 
Focus buddy is an AI productivity coach that stays on calls with you and help you accomplish your important work goals on a daily basis, even when you are struggling to focus.

We noticed that our users develop a productive relationship with Focus Buddy. Users stay on calls for multiple hours everyday where they depend on Focus Buddy to:
• Avoid procrastination and get started: Address hidden anxieties, embrace imperfection, chunk tasks, kickstart with mini-goals, and use regular check-ins to maintain momentum.
• Recover from distractions and stay focused: Focus Buddy detects when they are working on less important tasks or scrolling on social media, help them overcome the underlying concerns feeding the distraction, and help them get back to the important task
• Manage stress and Prevent Burnout: Focus Buddy detects stress buildup, integrates mindfulness habits to the workflow, helps take short rejuvenating breaks, and stay composed.

Our Initial ICP is people with ADHD who are highly motivated but also highly blocked by internal and environmental factors. In the future, we believe each worker should have their own personal coach that enforces proven productivity techniques in real time to help them extract more focused hours every day with the same effort.
one_liner: Currently in stealth - previously FocusBuddy

name: Moreta
long_description:
At Moreta, we simplify payments for international travelers, letting you pay for anything using just your phone. Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for the best cash exchange rates or ATMs on your next trip. With Moreta, paying local merchants is easy, and the best part? Transparent fees.

We came up with Moreta while on our own backpacking adventures. Watching locals pay with a simple scan while we fumbled with cards and cash. So, we created a solution. By syncing with local payment networks, Moreta lets you pay like a local securely and digitally, without needing a bank account in every country.

We’re starting in Asia, where QR code digital wallets are taking over and are now the top choice at checkout. As these wallets start to join forces for cross-border payments, Moreta will be the first to bridge the gap for international travelers from card-centric markets to seamlessly tap into these local networks. Moreta will target 67 million travelers arriving in the region each year, who together have $127 billion in everyday expenditure.
one_liner: Payments made easy for international travelers.

name: pap!
long_description:
Consumers miss out on $70B+ every year because they're busy and unaware, and that money is sitting in their email inbox. So, we automated reading email receipts and claiming the money they're entitled to, offering a service to which you can sign up once, do (literally) nothing, and earn $.

Where is this money coming from?

- Retailers: When the price of clothes or furniture you've already bought drops, you're entitled to a refund for the difference
- Airlines: When a flight you've booked gets delayed or canceled, you're entitled to a cash compensation.
- Enterprises: When a class-action lawsuit is filed against a company you engage with, you're entitled to money.
- And many more, that even the government holds some of your unclaimed funds.

Today, the dream of one service that automatically claims the money you deserve when you shop, fly,... and live is (finally) possible.

We started with automating refunds in the shopping industry and have secured $8,000 in refunds to our users, growing 233% MoM. With AI, we've been able to repurpose that same automation to tackle refunds in the flight industry and the class-action lawsuit landscape.

Why us? (1) We're obsessed with reclaiming what's rightfully yours: Kamal and Anthony grew up in Lebanon, where people's money was unfairly taken away. (2) Weijie was the lead infra engineer for Wish's recommendation system, the feature that fueled their IPO. Our combined experience includes Apple, Addepar, Bolt, Wish, and StackAdapt.

And we're all working towards one goal: move those billions of dollars where they belong.
one_liner: Agents that earn consumers dollars when they shop, travel, and live.

name: Dayflow
one_liner: A timeline of your day, automatically.

name: et al.
long_description:
et al. is a mobile app that aggregates your newsletters, research papers, articles, and more, in one place. Think of it as an LLM-powered feed delivering you useful content in short insights.

For example, if you’re building an AI voice agent, you’ll see the latest in speech-to-text models without having to actively search, go through a pile of research papers, or prompt an LLM.

We extract key takeaways from long-form content - allowing you to read as little or as much as you like from the original piece of information. With et al., you get to stay on top of breakthroughs in your field, build knowledge, and discover new interests effortlessly.
one_liner: Feed of insights extracted from your go-to sources using LLMs.

name: BrowserOS
long_description: BrowserOS is an open-source agentic browser that runs AI agents locally.
one_liner: The Open Source Agentic Browser

name: Overlap
long_description:
Overlap builds multimodal AI agents that can do literally anything you want related to video, such as finding specific moments, generating clips, or analyzing your video library. 

What takes media companies thousands of hours, we do in seconds.
one_liner: Multimodal AI agents for video

name: DreamRP
long_description:
AI entertainment feels like slop because companies chose technology over human creativity.

Companies like to focus on tech because it usually lets them win. But what fans love has never been about the tech.

A fan doesn’t fill their apartment with posters because of the lens a movie was shot on. They do it because of the mind behind the camera.

Like all technology, AI is just a tool. In the wrong hands, it makes endless sludge. In the right ones, fans will love entertainment more than ever.

DreamRP builds for creatives, from indie artists to global stars, because they have always been the real reason audiences love what they love.

If this resonates, message me.

Ethics FAQ on website in bio
one_liner: Tech and platforms for human creators and the entertainment industry

name: Candle
long_description:
Most relationships, romantic or platonic, don’t end in one moment, they drift apart over time. Missed check-ins, surface-level conversations, busy lives, and routines replace real connection. Candle helps couples and friends stay close through 1-minute daily rituals that bring back presence, play, and curiosity.

Candle gives couples and friends a daily, low-pressure game designed to create emotional momentum: the most essential, and often most neglected, ingredient in long-term connection.

What started as a swipeable questions game has grown into a full platform and private space for your relationship:

- Daily Prompts & Games: Thoughtful, funny, and unexpected questions, couple quizzes, audio and photo challenges that update and adapt monthly

- Shared Canvas Widget: Leave notes, doodles, or drawings right on each other’s home screen

- Now in beta: Date Ideas Swiping**: Get 60 curated date ideas based on your area (yes, even San Francisco :)), updated weekly. Swipe to match on what you both want to try. From pop-up events to hidden gems, it’s the easiest way to try something new together or even with friends or family! We’d love feedback here!

- Streaks & Shared Progress — Build accountability and a shared rhythm

- Adaptive Decks: Smarter, more relevant questions over time

- Shared Photo Albums & Memories: Keep track of all your photos and logged memories
one_liner: Candle helps couples and friends grow closer daily in just 5 minutes.

name: Darkgrade
long_description: We're building a protocol for large language models to directly interface with image sensors.
one_liner: Let your camera understand the world

name: ISSEN
long_description: ISSEN is an AI conversational language app that helps you become fluent. Your on-demand voice tutor is personal to you, adapting lessons and chats to your particular interests, learning style, and goals. Our mission is to transform language learning by offering a level of connection, effectiveness and fun that, until now, only human teachers could provide.
one_liner: AI realtime voice companion for language learning

name: HYBRD
long_description:
HYBRD helps you get stronger and faster. It pulls in all your training data, from every wearable and workout tracking app you use, and uses it to personalize training plans specifically to you and your goals

Existing products tend to focus on only one type of exercise (either cardio or strength), leaving hybrid athletes juggling disconnected tools. As hybrid athletes themselves the founders found this frustrating and set out to build the unified approach they needed for their training.

Three of HYBRD’s founders previously worked at WHOOP, each leading teams across product, growth and analytics. Ruiters, the CTO, was a senior tech lead at AWS. In parallel, Mats was a member of the US national rowing team and Ben, Shoe and Ruiters have all completed Ironman 70.3s. The team's VP of tech/founding engineer Michael rowed at Cornell and is ex-WHOOP as well.
one_liner: Get faster & stronger

name: Charm
long_description: Charm makes sending money as easy as sending email. Most people juggle multiple payment apps and scattered balances. Charm lets you pay anyone — no matter what app they use — and earns you 5% interest on your balance, automatically.
one_liner: Charm is the universal payments app — send money to anyone.

name: Diffusion Studio
long_description: Diffusion Studio Pro is a browser based non-linear editor (NLE) that uses WebCodecs and WebGPU to deliver smooth, pro level performance. It brings the modern UX of tools like Figma and Framer to video editing, making it easy for anyone to create professional content.
one_liner: Professional-grade video editing, in your browser.

name: Praxim
long_description: Praxim is the agentic AI word editor that makes edits across your entire word document with formatting control, file and web context, and your personal preferences in mind. Simply tell Praxim what you'd like to do with your document and Praxim will implement your changes automatically.
one_liner: The agentic AI Word editor

name: Dollyglot
long_description:
Dollyglot is like Character.ai but with real time video avatars.
Turn a photo and a voice into a real friend. Speak with Harry Potter about Hogwarts or brainstorm ideas with Elon Musk!
one_liner: Character.AI with real time video avatars

name: Karoo
long_description: Canadians have not benefitted from fintech innovations in the last 10 years. They are stuck with a banking oligopoly and limited access to tech-first financial offerings (a lot of products still require you going to a branch in person!). We're fixing this.
one_liner: Canadian neobank focused on lending

name: Swerve
one_liner: Chat with AI Characters

name: Pickle
long_description: Pickle is a personal, memory-based operating system, the missing layer of AI that continuously learns your real-world context, preferences, and intent, enabling AI to evolve with you and become truly proactive rather than reactive. Our system spans both software (Chat, our web-based creative intelligence app) and hardware (Pickle 1, our AI-powered AR glasses) to capture different layers of personal context. Together, they form the foundation of a real personal intelligence.
one_liner: Where your life context becomes understanding.

name: Misprint
long_description:
Misprint is an all-in-one marketplace that solves the biggest pain point in the collectibles world: opaque pricing. Collectors, investors, and hobbyists currently rely on scattered data from auction houses, online forums, and reseller platforms, making it difficult to know the true value of their items. Misprint streamlines the process by combining accurate pricing analytics with a seamless buy/sell marketplace, making it easier than ever to understand and monetize collectible assets.

Existing marketplaces lack robust, real-time analytics because accurate valuations require deep expertise in both the collectibles domain and advanced pricing algorithms. Misprint’s unique blend of insider trading card knowledge and machine learning allows us to fill this gap.

Building these pricing models requires extensive data infrastructure, deep domain expertise, and cutting-edge ML. Recent surges in the trading card market show that collectors crave transparent valuations.

The global collectibles market is worth tens of billions of dollars. Eva has experienced the scale of this industry firsthand, generating $500k ARR within three months of taking her Pokemon card-selling side hustle full-time. With additional segments like sports cards, comics, and emerging collectible categories, the growth runway is immense.

Co-founders Eva and Jon have been best friends since Exeter, combining finance expertise, a passion for collectibles, and mathematical rigor. By merging Goldman Sachs-level financial analytics with top-tier mathematical talent, Misprint is uniquely positioned to become the go-to platform for fair, transparent pricing in the collectibles space.
one_liner: Misprint is building Robinhood for Pokemon cards

name: Opine
long_description: Get opinions from anyone by talking to an AI chatbot trained on their content
one_liner: Opinionated AI

name: Mentra
long_description: Mentra is building the open source operating system for smart glasses. The smart glasses hardware is finally ready, so we're building the OS and app store to power the next computing platform.
one_liner: Building the open source smart glasses operating system.

name: Chestnut
long_description: Chestnut is the first AI mortgage lender. We automate 99% of human work with AI agents, saving customers 0.5%+ in interest. This is Spencer's second mortgage startup; the first processes 2% of US mortgages annually. So far, Chestnut is licensed in Texas and Colorado where we power purchases, refinances, cash-outs, and more.
one_liner: The first AI mortgage lender

name: neoncoral
one_liner: 🪸 AI consumer social

name: Ralo
long_description: Ralo is a mortgage platform built to deliver lower rates and lower fees by cutting out unnecessary intermediaries. We automate the complex work behind the scenes, from paperwork to pricing and negotiation.
one_liner: Find Your Best Mortgage Deal

name: TypeOS
long_description: Built to advance human taste to the frontier, TypeOS is the best way to write with AI.
one_liner: AI writing you control with your taste.

name: Tegore
long_description:
Tegore follows K-12 school curriculum to design courses like Algebra I & Algebra II. In addition to working with high schools in the Bay Area to design the best in-classroom experiences, Tegore is developing the corresponding consumer product, a Duolingo for Math.

Each lesson in Tegore follows a lesson plan (e.g. Polynomial Long Division), and the content is delivered with voice / interactive visuals, and checks students' understanding by using dialectic teaching.
one_liner: Your new AI-powered math tutor.

name: HABIT
long_description: Every month, our robots greet thousands of Americans with a smile. They answer questions, upsell customers, and can be trained just like a human employee.
one_liner: Conversational robots for physical businesses.

name: Wavedash
long_description: Wavedash uses cutting edge browser technology to let gamers play the latest releases with no downloads or installation.
one_liner: Play the latest games in your browser with no downloads

name: Fifth Door
long_description: Fifth Door unlocks the power of imagination by making it easy for everyone to create, share, and play games anywhere, with anyone. We exist to stimulate the creativity, connection, and joy that people get when they play games.
one_liner: Create and play games with AI

name: Meteor
long_description:
Meet Meteor: a Chrome-alternative that can actually do your work for you.

With agents getting better by the day (literally), we realize that it’s time to automate the boring, tedious work.

We use your browser session to empower agents to act like your personal assistants (ex. book a calendar, find cheaper flights, buy clothes on amazon etc.)

Some of Meteor’s features:

- Chat with any page
- Integrate with popular apps like Gmail, Google Calendar, Twitter etc.
- Browser agent to autonomously navigate the web and perform tasks
- More coming soon!

We're excited to usher in a new era of browsing.
one_liner: An AI-Native Browser

name: cocreate
long_description: Before editing begins, professional video teams spend days copying, organizing, and prepping footage — a process that can eat up 40% of a project’s time and budget. CoCreate runs in the background during backup, delivering fully organized, searchable, and edit-ready projects for Premiere, Avid, Final Cut, or Resolve the moment media is offloaded. The result: faster turnarounds, fewer errors, and more time spent actually editing.
one_liner: AI-native video production software that automates post-production

name: VibeFlow
long_description: VibeFlow generates full-stack web apps from prompts with n8n-style visual workflows for the backend. Users of tools like Lovable or v0 can easily iterate over frontends because they can see them, while backends remain closed black boxes that are hard to evolve through prompting. VibeFlow opens up backend logic, making it visual and editable, with powerful integrations built in.
one_liner: Lovable, n8n and a database all in one platform

name: GoRiff
long_description:
Riff is a music editor with superpowers — helping artists work faster and making it easier than ever for hobbyists to break into music.

As we continue to build, we see Riff turning into an entirely new paradigm for creating music.
one_liner: Cursor for music production

name: April
long_description: April is a voice AI Executive assistant that manages your email and calendar, hands free. It’s built for busy individuals who need EAs but don’t have them.
one_liner: Voice AI Executive Assistant

name: Opennote
long_description:
Opennote is the one space for everything you study, turning chaos into clarity.

Most learners struggle with scattered knowledge across different apps and tools that don't understand their learning style. Opennote changes that with a note-taking platform where AI knows your style, connects to your existing knowledge bases and the web, and provides proactive feedback and edits—right where you're already working.
one_liner: Write, learn, and connect ideas—all in one place

name: Pally
long_description:
We spend our lives in messaging apps. Slack. iMessage. WhatsApp. We face a constant stream of information, introductions, and things we need to do.

What if you could bring together every message, from every platform, in a Superhuman-like experience, with AI agents that automatically complete your action items?

That’s exactly what we’re building at Pally; a future where you never need to check another inbox again.
one_liner: Intelligent Unified Inbox + Personal CRM

name: Munify
long_description: Munify is the cross-border Neobank for the Middle East and its diaspora. Instantly open a USD account, get a virtual card, and send money home at the best rates, all from one app.
one_liner: The Cross-Border Neobank for the Middle East

name: RealRoots
long_description: This is where real friendships begin. Women use our mobile app to talk to Lisa, our AI matchmaker, and get set up for fun social experiences with compatible new friends, all planned and coordinated by AI.
one_liner: AI social app for women

name: Mixy
long_description:
Live out your DJ dreams with Mixy, the mind-blowing music app that lets you mash-up any song in seconds.

⁕ Add your songs
⁕ Instantly blend vocals and beats
⁕ Play and share your mashup anywhere

There’s no limit to your imagination!

⁕ Launched to #1 in Music on June 19th
⁕ 1.5M users in 3 months
⁕ 15M mashups made and growing
one_liner: Make mashups without knowing how to DJ

name: Digipals
long_description:
Social networks are dead. Social media became more media than social. My friends aren't on social media anymore - it's one third ads, one third content from strangers, and one third AI slop. Our social lives are fragmented across dozens of different apps - iMessage, WhatsApp, Find My, Partiful, and Venmo. 

Digipals is the first AI-native social operating system that improves our relationships with friends. We built ambient AI agents that use social context from our location, calendar, and photos to take action and write code in our group chats. We are the last social platform anyone will ever need.

Launch Video
https://youtu.be/KW2tjLl6sxM
one_liner: The future of Social in the age of AI

name: Sorce
long_description: Tinder for Jobs. Swipe right, AI applies on your behalf.
one_liner: Tinder for jobs

name: Iris
long_description:
Iris observes how you handle your day - how you reply, decide, prioritize - and prepares the next set of actions. Our key insight: if you model real behavior, you can replicate judgment, not just tasks using personal agents and knowledge graphs. Iris knows what needs your attention across your accounts, pre-fills the actions, and you can simply swipe right to hand it off to your agent.

We started with connecting calendars and emails. We launched four weeks ago. Over 1,200 people have downloaded Iris, 168 use it every day, and they’ve taken more than 36,000 actions so far growing 48% week over week.

In the future, everyone will have a personal proxy running their digital life with near perfect accuracy. Iris is the first real version of that future.
one_liner: The Digital Extension of Yourself

name: Nessie
long_description:
Nessie is building personal AI brains that augment human cognition.

Nessie turns your scattered AI conversations and documents into a shareable AI brain you actually own. It's a thinking partner that lets you instantly search your entire history of ideas, synthesize them into new insights, and watch your knowledge build on itself over time.

Right now, your best thinking is trapped in ephemeral AI chat histories. Nessie unifies your context from ChatGPT, Claude, and (soon) Apple Notes/Google Docs/Notion/other context sources, auto-organizing the mess into an AI-enhanced brain.

Next, we are unlocking sharing. Instead of sending a static doc, you will be able to send your "Product Strategy Brain" to a cofounder, or publish your "Research Brain" for your entire team to chat with.

Who it's for: AI-native thinkers—founders, researchers, and writers—who believe their best ideas should compound.

The Team: We are two Yale CS grads and former Amazon engineers building the tool we needed for ourselves. We combine Anna's obsession with neuroscience and augmenting human cognition with Tiger's lifelong passion for building products (he shipped an app with 70k+ users at age 13).

Traction: Launched 3 weeks ago. We have over 1,200 users who have imported 300,000+ AI conversations into Nessie. 30% week-over-week organic user growth.

Origin Story: Nessie was born after we hit the 1-million-token limit in multiple Gemini chats. Overnight, months of research disappeared. We realized the problem wasn't just about storage; it was that the medium for AI-native thought didn't exist yet. The chat window is a place to ask questions, not a place to build a mind.

Our Vision: We are building a new medium for personal intelligence. Everyone will have an AI brain on Nessie. You will use it to think better, remember more, and share your mind with the world.
one_liner: Shareable AI Brains for Everyone

name: SellRaze
long_description:
SellRaze is an AI-powered selling assistant that helps anyone sell anything in seconds. Point your camera at any item and we'll identify it, price it, and create an engaging listing across multiple marketplaces, including our own.

Each day, more than 2,500 items are added to SellRaze, representing over $326,000 in inventory value.
one_liner: The fastest way to sell online.

name: Logical
long_description: Logical is a desktop AI that acts as a proactive and largely promptless copilot, designed to reduce the friction of using AI for everyday tasks. It transfers context across apps, and allows taking action on many apps with just a few clicks. Logical can assist with drafting emails, writing docs, noting meetings and can even automatically detect action items. Need to prompt? Logical can understand intent in much fewer words than a regular chatbot. Plus, user data is never sent to Logical servers. Logical is the AI resurrection of Clippy, but actually good.
one_liner: A proactive desktop copilot. Clippy, but actually good.

name: Selfin
long_description: Selfin is developing AI-powered banking. Users can enjoy personalised recommendations and optimisations of their finances by connecting all their financial products on a single platform.
one_liner: Building the first AI Bank

name: Miniswap
long_description:
Miniswap a marketplace for complex hobbies, starting with Warhammer.

In hobbies as complex as Warhammer, finding what you want on general marketplaces is a huge pain. Filters don't work, free-form listings mean that products are regularly misidentified, and piles of counterfeit junk crowd search results. 

Miniswap saves hobbyists from this chaos with its catalogue of more than 20,000 unique miniatures. Sellers match their listings against Miniswap's catalogue giving buyers more information and structure as they shop.

The global market for tabletop games is estimated to be worth $20B in 2025 and Warhammer alone is projected to grow to $3B by 2030. By capturing the market in this untapped niche, Miniswap is strongly positioned to bringing greater transparency, simplicity, and connectivity into adjacent verticals.

Miniswap's founding team merges deep domain knowledge with elite programming expertise and years of experience in business consulting and startups. Co-founders Zak and Will met while studying together at Cambridge, bonded over their love of Warhammer and early modern history. They have been best friends ever since.
one_liner: The Marketplace for Complex Hobbies

name: Pax Historia
long_description:
Pax Historia is an alternate-history sandbox game where players choose a country, a moment in time, and rewrite the course of history. What if Rome never fell? What if the Soviet Union survived? What if Genghis Khan ruled for another generation?

We go beyond history, too. What if aliens invaded Earth? What if you were a college dropout creating a tech startup? The ability to create, edit, and copy custom maps, actors, historical context, and more means that users can play nearly any scenario they can imagine.

In the last four months we've organically built a passionate fanbase of tens of thousands of daily active players and we're excited to expand on this early start. Consider joining us to help build vastly better tools for creators and experiences for players.
one_liner: The first AI-powered grand strategy platform
